citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Access and inspection of records and property
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1205 on
02/11/2015. Licensee was not at the facility at the time of the attempted inspection and a representative informed
the inspector that they were not authorized to accompany the inspector.
